title: PBE
body:
Does anyone one know if PBE runs on a OCE server so our ping doesn't make it unplayable. 

Having to play on NA from Australia is trashy for most people unless you are lucky enough to have extremely good internet because you actually have the money for it XD

replies.body: To add on to BarryButcher's answer, the PBE is it's own server, but is physically located in NA. Since it's only a testing server, it isn't going to be expanded, and since basically all the dev happens at central HQ (in NA), it's not going to be moved.

no. PBE is NA only. They don't need or want more since its just for testing

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ
